EnExplanation: A conjunction used to introduce a contrast or exception to a statement.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma lähen õue, kuid see sajab vihma.
Samples.EnSentence: I am going outside, but it is raining.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma tahan minna, kuid vihma sajab.
Samples.EnSentence: I want to go, but it is raining.
